thread.title: 21st birthday celebration for my daughter
thread.title_full: 21st birthday celebration for my daughter - Review of ME London, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: Robbos18
title: 21st birthday celebration for my daughter
text:
from the time of booking through to check out the staff could not have been more lovely, a surprise chocolate mousse and a bottle of fizz on arrival was such a thoughtful touch. An amzing building in a great location we will be back.
Room Tip: Great view down The Strand See more room tips
